column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My boyfriend and I were hungry so we came here for a late night snack. 15 minute wait
column2: not too bad. We also ordered our food within seconds of getting seated. Staff was nice but they definitely rushed our food. My boyfriend order a Spicy Tonkotsu Black
column4: the shell was still attached to his egg. The manager was notified and we were given a 10% discount?
